description.zh-cn: 中国国民党籍政治人物，现任新北市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician from the Kuomintang (KMT), currently the mayor of New Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党籍政治人物，曾任新北市市长。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician from the Kuomintang (KMT), former mayor of New Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 新北市副市长，曾在侯友宜请假期间代理市长职务。
description.en: Deputy Mayor of New Taipei City, who served as acting mayor while Hou Yu-ih was on leave.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国新北市的最高行政首长。
description.en: The chief executive of New Taipei City, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 新北市市长的前身职务。
description.en: The predecessor position to the Mayor of New Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的直辖市之一，由原台北县升格而来。
description.en: A special municipality in the Republic of China, upgraded from the former Taipei County.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省曾经的县份，于2010年12月25日升格为新北市。
description.en: A former county of Taiwan Province, Republic of China, which was upgraded to New Taipei City on December 25, 2010.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第14任总统、副总统选举。
description.en: The 14th presidential and vice-presidential election of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第16任总统、副总统选举。
description.en: The 16th presidential and vice-presidential election of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台北县于2010年12月25日改制为直辖市新北市。
description.en: Taipei County was reorganized into the special municipality of New Taipei City on December 25, 2010.

description.zh-cn: 朱立伦是新北市升格为直辖市后的首位市长，并成功连任。
description.en: Eric Chu was the first mayor of New Taipei City after its upgrade to a special municipality, and he was successfully re-elected.

description.zh-cn: 侯友宜接替朱立伦担任新北市市长。
description.en: Hou Yu-ih succeeded Eric Chu as the mayor of New Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 朱立伦是中国国民党籍政治人物。
description.en: Eric Chu is a politician from the Kuomintang (KMT).

description.zh-cn: 侯友宜是中国国民党籍政治人物。
description.en: Hou Yu-ih is a politician from the Kuomintang (KMT).

description.zh-cn: 侯友宜曾任朱立伦市长任内的副市长，并在2015年10月20日至2016年1月18日期间，因朱立伦参选总统而代理市长职务。
description.en: Hou Yu-ih served as Deputy Mayor under Mayor Eric Chu and acted as mayor from October 20, 2015, to January 18, 2016, while Chu ran for president.

description.zh-cn: 在2023年9月23日至2024年1月13日期间，因侯友宜参选总统而代理市长职务。
description.en: Acted as mayor from September 23, 2023, to January 13, 2024, while Hou Yu-ih ran for president.

description.zh-cn: 朱立伦为参选2016年总统选举，于2015年10月20日至2016年1月18日期间请假新北市市长职务。
description.en: To run in the 2016 presidential election, Eric Chu took a leave of absence from his duties as Mayor of New Taipei City from October 20, 2015, to January 18, 2016.

description.zh-cn: 侯友宜为参选2024年总统选举，于2023年9月23日至2024年1月13日期间请假新北市市长职务。
description.en: To run in the 2024 presidential election, Hou Yu-ih took a leave of absence from his duties as Mayor of New Taipei City from September 23, 2023, to January 13, 2024.

description.zh-cn: 该事件的发生，设立了新北市。
description.en: This event established New Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 该事件的发生，结束了台北县作为行政区划的名称和地位。
description.en: This event ended the name and status of Taipei County as an administrative division.

description.zh-cn: 该事件的发生，设立了新北市市长这一职务。
description.en: This event established the position of Mayor of New Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 该事件的发生，使得台北县县长职务被新北市市长职务取代。
description.en: This event led to the replacement of the Magistrate of Taipei County position with the Mayor of New Taipei City position.
